resources.string: Hello there! \n\nThanks for sharing your plans with me and my friends. We are always looking for new ways to make your experience better. So please, feel free to take a look to this Guide with some tips to make your trips more fun, safe and epic!

And if liked this App, don"'"t forget to give it 5 stars on Google App Store. 

See ya my friend. 

Love,
Travis The Migratory Bird picture - Hint: He is an eastern blue bird
